titleStmt.title: At Whitehall the eleuenth of March 1628 ... whereas His Maiesties armie (lately discharged at Portsmouth) hath continued since the first raysing thereof by the space of forty two months ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton, and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: faded, with loss of text.
Announcing audit to determine what pay is due to officers.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
